snippet: The sprinter Debbie Dunn accepted a two-year suspension after testing positive for a prohibited substance, the United States Anti-Doping Agency said.
lead_paragraph: The sprinter Debbie Dunn accepted a two-year suspension after testing positive for a prohibited substance, the United States Anti-Doping Agency said.

headline.seo: U.S. Sprinter Debbie Dunn Banned Two Years for Doping
headline.main: U.S. Runner Dunn Banned Two Years for Doping
